newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Baker Hughes reduced.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Baker Hughes reduced.

text.p: Brown Brothers Harriman & Co Michael LaMotte cut his long-term rating for oil services company Baker Hughes Inc Thursday to market perform from outperform.
-- He kept his short-term hold rating for the company.
-- The downgrade was caused by Baker Hughes' "lack of visible pricing power, potential loss of management credibility and better relative opportunity elsewhere," he told Reuters.
-- Shares in Baker Hughes were up 7/16 to 42-7/16 in heavy trade.
